org.franca.core.dsl

Class FrancaPersistenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.franca.core.dsl.FrancaPersistenceManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrancaIDLHelpers

    public class FrancaPersistenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for loading and saving Franca models from file system. It supports models which are distributed over several files. The implementation is dependency-injection-aware.
    Author:
    kbirken

      • getFileExtension

        public java.lang.String getFileExtension()

      • loadModel

        public FModel loadModel(java.lang.String filename)
        Deprecated. Use loadModel(URI uri, URI root) instead.
        Load Franca IDL model file (*.fidl) and all imported files recursively.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of Franca file (suffix .fidl is optional)
        Returns:
        the root entity of the Franca IDL model

      • loadModel

        public FModel loadModel(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI uri,
               org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI root)
        Load Franca IDL model file (*.fidl) and all imported files recursively.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI for Franca file
        root - the root of the model (needed for loading multiple file models) This has to be an absolute, hierarchical URI.
        Returns:
        the root entity of the Franca model

      • saveModel

        public boolean saveModel(FModel model,
                java.lang.String filename)
        Save a Franca IDL model to file (*.fidl).
        Parameters:
        model - the root of model to be saved
        filename - name of Franca file (suffix .fidl is optional)
        Returns:
        true if save could be completed successfully

      • saveModel

        public boolean saveModel(FModel model,
                java.lang.String filename,
                IImportedModelProvider importedModels)

      • saveModel

        public boolean saveModel(FModel model,
                java.lang.String filename,
                java.lang.String cwd)
        Save a Franca IDL model to file (*.fidl).
        Parameters:
        model - the root of model to be saved
        filename - name of Franca file (suffix .fidl is optional)
        cwd - if not null work relatively to this path
        Returns:
        true if save could be completed successfully
